description:
A classic 4th class Sedona scramble to the top of West Twin Butte, followed by a technical descent down a gritty chasm that opens up to to a scenic slick rock watercourse.

Leave the piglets at the farm as this is not a beginner or family friendly route.

      • PG Rating: Loose rock and terrain especially up top.

A Retrievable anchor was used between R1 and Hog wash. A couple short drops and (1) 65' 2 stage rappel must be negotiated.

Not reccomended for the casual rappeler.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

name: Choss Hawg
